Author: faultlessly
Text: Something that I find works is to start doing something that is not only enjoyable, but physically prevents you from eating. So maybe like going for a walk/run, playing video games, whatever sport you play etc. For me if I just mope around watching Netflix I feel like there is some external force physically making me eat a family sized bag of Doritos in half an episode of pretty little liars lmfao

Author: hazyjays
Text: don’t know if this is helpful for you but i tend to chew sugar free gum or down a big cup of diet sprite to stop myself feeling hungry when i’m bored (also sunflower seeds are great since they’re such a pain to open. i get fed up with the process pretty quick so it’s hard to go overboard + because you crack the shells with your teeth you get the satisfaction of a crunchy snack without consuming it)
